attributes.description:
All Audi Vehicles are sold with the balance of their 
5 Year-100 000km Audi Free Way Plan.
All our cars are sold with a certified 80 point Check 
and supported by the relevant manufactures workshop.
Our finance department specialize in deal structuring and are
Able to Tailor your finance application to your specific requirements.  
We offer country wide delivery at an agreed price, 
Our team of Certified Sales Executives are available to 
help structure and conclude your vehicle purchase  
*Floor mats at front and rear  
*Provision for towing bracket  
*Multifunction Steering Wheel 
*Paddle Shift Steering  
*Tire Pressure Monitors 
*Cruise control   
*Cigarette lighter and ashtray      
*Alloy Mags

attributes.description:
Over 200 cars to choose from, quality PreOwned Vehicles (Used) Negotiable on Cash deal Base, good colour condition.
For a test drive contact SALES TEAM:Ms Zama 068 579 5480 or 0100651820  or Mr Hilston -074 485 8555.
Finance can be arranged through all major banks with an extra charge of R10.000 Finance Based.Trade-In available, Delivery Nationwide, fees charged depending on Location.
At HILSTON CARS you're handled as an exclusive customer with unique need and wishes. We guarantee you a great service cause that what you deserve.
Buying a used vehicle from us means buying peace of mind. Quality, Choice, and value, that's HILSTON CARS difference. 
We specialised in packaging the perfect deal and all the options for buying your vehicle from sales through Finance

attributes.description:
As a first of its kind, with over three decades of constant improvement in design and performance, the Vitara name has blazed the way forward for compact SUVs. Now, four generations later, the all-new Vitara Brezza defies all the odds and continues to deliver on the exceptional.

 

The Vitara Brezza’s contemporary design pays homage to the Vitara’s Compact SUV heritage. The brawny exterior is adorned with a touch of modern pizzazz. The Vitara Brezza’s 1.5?  engine is perfectly coupled with a premium and sporty luxury-fitted cabin to make sure your drive isn’t just good, it is the best.
